MessageTypes.label: Set Active Frequency
MessageTypes.description:
$ will be displayed on the device as Active Frequency
\R or \C as leading chars will align right or center
Within Modify Tab use double \\

MessageTypes.label: Set Standby Frequency
MessageTypes.description:
$ will be displayed on the device as Standby Frequency
\R or \C as leading chars will align right or center
Within Modify Tab use double \\

MessageTypes.label: Set Active Station
MessageTypes.description:
$ will be displayed on the device below Active Frequency, e.g. active station ICAO code
\R or \C as leading chars will align right or center
\L starts on beginning of line
Within Modify Tab use double \\

MessageTypes.label: Set Standby Station
MessageTypes.description:
$ will be displayed on the device below Standby Frequency, e.g. standby station ICAO code
\R or \C as leading chars will align right or center
Within Modify Tab use double \\

MessageTypes.label: Set Mode
MessageTypes.description:
0 -> COM Mode, 1 -> NAV Mode
!!Depracated!! Use Set Label Mode area instead
